languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс ван Калокс, приблизившийся к вам, выглядит не лучшим образом — кажется, он давно не спал.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, позвольте выразить свою радость от того, что вы воссоединились с нами — жив{mf|ым|ой} и здоров{mf|ым|ой}".

{n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He is not looking his best. It seems he has not slept in quite a while.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you have rejoined us, alive and unharmed."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс ван Калокс, приблизившийся к вам, выглядит не лучшим образом — кажется, он давно не спал.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, позвольте выразить свою радость от того, что вы воссоединились с нами — жив{mf|ым|ой} и здоров{mf|ым|ой}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He's not looking his best. It seems he hasn't slept in quite a while. His voice is completely lifeless.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you've rejoined us, alive and unharmed. I regret having to do this, but there's something I need to discuss with you. It concerns an astropathic message I received while you were away. Let me know when you're ready to talk to me."

{n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He's not looking his best. It seems he hasn't slept in quite a while. His voice is completely lifeless.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you've rejoined us, alive and unharmed. I regret having to do this, but there's something I need to discuss with you. It concerns an astropathic message I received while you were away. Let me know when you're ready to talk to me."

{n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He's not looking his best. It seems he hasn't slept in quite a while. His voice is completely lifeless.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you've rejoined us, alive and unharmed. I regret having to do this but there's something I need to discuss with you. It concerns an astropathic message I received while you were away. Let me know when you're ready to talk to me."

{n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He's not looking his best. It seems he hasn't slept in quite a while. His voice is completely lifeless.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you've rejoined us, alive and unharmed. I regret having to do this but there's something I need to discuss with you. It concerns an astropathic message I received while you were away. Let me know when you're ready to talk to me."

{n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He is not looking his best. It seems he has not slept in quite a while.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you have rejoined us, alive and unharmed."

{n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He is not looking his best. It seems he has not slept in quite a while.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you have rejoined us, alive and unharmed."

languages.text: {n}海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯朝你走了过来。他的状况看起来不太好，似乎已经相当一阵子没睡过觉了。{/n}“舰长大人，看到你平安归来，我真的非常开心。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He is not looking his best. It seems he has not slept in quite a while.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you have rejoined us, alive and unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯朝你走了过来。他的状况看起来不太好，似乎已经相当一阵子没睡过觉了，他的声音也没有一丝生机。{/n}“舰长大人，看到你平安归来，我真的非常开心。我很抱歉打扰你，但我有件事情想和你讨论一下。你不在的这段期间，星语唱诗班给我发来了一条信息。等你有时间的时候，我们坐下来谈谈吧。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix van Calox tritt an dich heran. Er sieht nicht gut aus. Offenbar hat er seit längerer Zeit nicht geschlafen.{/n} "Lord Captain, gestattet mir, meiner Freude darüber Ausdruck zu verleihen, dass Ihr wieder bei uns seid, lebendig und unversehrt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He is not looking his best. It seems he has not slept in quite a while.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you have rejoined us, alive and unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox tritt an dich heran. Er sieht nicht gut aus. Offenbar hat er seit längerer Zeit nicht geschlafen. Seine Stimme ist vollkommen leblos.{/n} "Lord Captain, gestattet mir, meiner Freude darüber Ausdruck zu verleihen, dass Ihr wieder bei uns seid, lebendig und unversehrt. Ich bedauere, dies tun zu müssen, doch muss etwas mit Euch besprechen. Es geht um eine astropathische Nachricht, die ich in Eurer Abwesenheit erhalten habe. Lasst mich wissen, wann Ihr Zeit für ein Gespräch habt."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix van Calox se acerca a ti. No tiene buen aspecto; parece que lleva mucho sin dormir.{/n} «Lord Capitán, permítame expresarle lo contento que estoy por tenerle de nuevo entre nosotros {mf|sano y salvo|sana y salva}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He is not looking his best. It seems he has not slept in quite a while.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you have rejoined us, alive and unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox se acerca a ti. No tiene buen aspecto; parece que lleva mucho sin dormir. La voz apenas le sale del cuerpo.{/n} «Lord Capitán, permítame expresarle lo contento que estoy por tenerle de nuevo entre nosotros {mf|sano y salvo|sana y salva}. Lamento importunarle, pero hay algo que debo discutir con usted. Se trata de un mensaje Astropático que recibí durante su ausencia. Avísame cuando tenga tiempo para hablar conmigo».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix van Calox s'approche de vous. Il n'a pas l'air au meilleur de sa forme et semble n'avoir pas dormi depuis un certain temps.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, permettez-moi de vous dire à quel point je suis heureux de vous retrouver {mf|sain et sauf|saine et sauve}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He is not looking his best. It seems he has not slept in quite a while.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you have rejoined us, alive and unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox s'approche de vous. Il n'a pas l'air au meilleur de sa forme et semble n'avoir pas dormi depuis un certain temps. Il parle d'une voix complètement monocorde.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, permettez-moi de vous dire à quel point je suis heureux de vous retrouver {mf|sain et sauf|saine et sauve}. Je vous prie de m'excuser, mais je dois absolument m'entretenir avec vous. C'est au sujet d'un message astropathique que j'ai reçu en votre absence. Prévenez-moi quand vous aurez le temps d'en discuter. »

languages.text: {n}ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスが近づいてくる。彼はベストの状態ではないようだ。しばらく眠っていないように見える。彼の声はまったく生気がない。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたが無傷で生きて我々の元へ戻ってきてくれて、どれほどうれしいか」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He is not looking his best. It seems he has not slept in quite a while.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you have rejoined us, alive and unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスが近づいてくる。彼はベストの状態ではないようだ。しばらく眠っていないように見える。彼の声はまったく生気がない。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あなたが無傷で生きて我々の元へ戻ってきてくれて、どれほどうれしいか」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix van Calox sana yaklaşıyor. Pek iyi görünmüyor. Epeydir uyumadığı belli.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, size sağ salim kavuşmanın verdiği mutluluğu anlatamam."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix van Calox approaches you. He is not looking his best. It seems he has not slept in quite a while.{/n} "Lord Captain, allow me to express how glad I am that you have rejoined us, alive and unharmed."
